lead_paragraph: For most pitchers, flirting with a no-hitter might be one of the most memorable days of your career. For Max Scherzer, it was just another day at the office.

headline.print_headline: Scherzer Dominant as Nationals Edge Phillies 3-2
headline.main: Scherzer Dominant as Nationals Edge Phillies 3-2
